snippet.title: Make a Good Mega Man Level Contest (Part 1) - Bottom of the Barrel
snippet.description:
Download here - http://sprites-inc.co.uk/showthread.php?tid=1484

We're doing something slightly different today (sort of). That right, I'm going back to my old format! For this playthrough at least, simply because this game will just work better that way. This game was essentially the results of a contest a while ago where the objective was... yep, you guessed it, to make a good Mega Man level. Some of these levels succeed in very unique ways, other fall flat on their face, to such an extent that they make the recommended Super Meat World levels look like indie masterpieces. Either way, we're starting at the bottom, and we'll be clawing our way up. It's sure to be a bumpy journey to begin with, but hopefully it'll all be worth it in the end.
